word_mean: 迷路：互相联系的腔或管道系统，尤指构成内耳者

sentence.Network_en: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

sentence.Network_en: We lost our way in the labyrinth of streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在迷宫式的街道上迷了路。

sentence.Network_en: He wandered through the labyrinth of the alleyways.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在迷宫似的小巷中闲逛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 但迷宫(Labyrinth)的目标很单一，也不包容意图以外的可能性，它有正确的路径和行动模式。被设计出来的空间却不是。

迷字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 迷惑〖 confuse;delude;dupe〗 迷津〖 labyrinth;wrongpath〗 迷离〖 blurred;daze〗.

list.abs: ...knuckle bearing铰式支座,球形支座,关节轴承labyrinth bearing迷宫轴承,曲径式密封轴承laminated bearing夹布胶木轴承,层压轴承
...膜迷路编辑膜迷路(membranous labyrinth)亦称为膜样迷路(bony labyrinth)，是内耳的主要部分，在鸟类，哺乳类与骨迷路(bony lab-yrinth)的形状基本相同，目录1简介.
...因此也会产生恶心、呕吐、盗冷汗之迷走神经的症状。2骨迷路组成骨迷路(bony labyrinth)沿颞骨岩部长轴排列，由后外上至前内下共分为三部即骨半规管、前庭和耳蜗.
迷宫油封,labyrinth... ... ) labyrinth seal 迷宫油封 ) floating ring type labyrinth packing 浮环式迷宫油封.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (referring to the maze constructed by Daedalus to house the Minotaur): from French labyrinthe or Latin labyrinthus, from Greek laburinthos

encyclopedia.content: LABYRINTH（迷宫），最初成立于1991年，是意大利金属/摇滚音乐最杰出的代表－。1994年，乐队的首张EP专辑《Piece of Time》强势推出。自组队以来，多次参加万人级别的欧洲大型露天音乐节。

entry.def: If you describe a place as a labyrinth, you mean that it is made up of a complicated series of paths or passages, through which it is difficult to find your way.

entry.tran: 错综复杂的事物；千头万绪的局面；盘根错节的情况
entry.def: If you describe a situation, process, or area of knowledge as a labyrinth, you mean that it is very complicated.

example.ex: ...a labyrinth of conflicting political and sociological interpretations.
example.tran: 错综复杂、相互矛盾的政治学与社会学诠释

means.word_mean: 1. complex system of paths or tunnels in which it is easy to get lost
2. a complex system of interconnecting cavities; concerned with hearing and equilibrium

auth_sentence.content: The real Trebizond...was in the labyrinth of narrow streets.
auth_sentence.res_content: The real Trebizond...was in the labyrinth of narrow streets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The real Trebizond...was in the labyrinth of narrow streets.

auth_sentence.content: What is the Labyrinth but so much human junk?
auth_sentence.res_content: What is the Labyrinth but so much human junk?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is the Labyrinth but so much human junk?

auth_sentence.content: There are...few guides...through the labyrinth of inarticulate facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are...few guides...through the labyrinth of inarticulate facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are...few guides...through the labyrinth of inarticulate facts.

sentences.en: He wandered through the labyrinth of the alleyways.
sentences.cn: 他在迷宫似的小巷中闲逛。

sentences.en: The local zoning laws were a labyrinth of rules and regulations
sentences.cn: 城市规划法是一部非常复杂的规章制度。
